title: New: Tape Waves â€“ Looking At The Sun / Stay All Night
content:
Oh yeaah, this is about as dreamy as it gets, perfect late night Friday listening.

South Carolina duo Tape Waves cropped up a while back, with their Beach House meets Real Estate vibes, and are now back for more with two new tracks. The lovelorn plea of Looking At The Sun and the lustful, endearingly honest Stay All Night are further indication that Tape Waves are here to stay. Love. Love. Love.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
